presentation.label: Web
presentation.description:
Creates a web page showing list of available channels with their values. It supports setting new values and refreshing.
It auto-updates the displayed values every `polling` seconds. If polling is 0, no auto-update occurs.

setting.label: Page
setting.tooltip: Page name which will be served by this presentation module.

setting.label: Port
setting.tooltip: Port value of the HTTP server.

setting.label: Polling
setting.tooltip: How often, in seconds, the channel values are refreshed. 0 means no polling.

setting.label: Use default server
setting.tooltip: Set this value to False if you are going to use your own HTTP server.

setting.label: Title
setting.tooltip: Title of the web page that will be created with this presentation.
